description:
Master Van finds slave finn tied up to a pole. Since Van's day didn't go too
well, he decides to take it out on the boy. After smacking finn around, Van
inserts a metal hook into the slave's ass. Van drags him across the
warehouse, then ties him to the bondage posts where the slave endures a heavy flogging. The slave's balls are placed in a tight crushing device, and he's made to pop his wad. Van then gives the suspended finn a hard fuck, and after the slave cums again, Van showers finn's entire face with his load.
Director's note: On the day of the shoot, our dom model called and said, "Oh by the way, I have a cast on my arm." I don't know why he didn't tell us earlier and was suddenly too busy trying to put together a Plan B to ask.
The set was huge and it took two days to set up; one day to build the platform and move props, and a second day for lighting. I wasn't about to scrap the shoot so I jumped in as dom at the last minute.
I just want to let everyone know the situation so I wouldn't be accused of
being a scene/update hog!
title: Master Van Darkholme and slave finn damion
